publication.title: MINHO Robot Football Team for 2001
publication.keyword: Autonomous Robot;Data Acquisition;Football;Image Processing;Sensory System;Vision System;
publication.abstract: Abstract.This paper describes an autonomous robot football team. The work is being carried out since 1998. It describes the hardware used by the robots, the sensory system and interfaces, as well as the game strategy.
